At 04:59 PM 07/02/02, you wrote:

>I apologize for being a bit off topic but I was wondering, given the
>wealth of testing knowledge in this group, if anyone has run across a
>good tool for automated evaluation of coupling in a system of java
>programs?
>
>The ObjectMentor guys have this bash shell
>script(http://www.objectmentor.com/resources/downloads/index) which does
>it for directories of C++ code but I wonder if there's something a bit
>more accessible and java oriented?


JDepend can do this - http://www.clarkware.com/.
